rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming open space with natural stone accents and ambient lighting.

rooms.name: Open Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: An expansive area merging the living room, dining area, and kitchen. Features a rustic farmhouse aesthetic with reclaimed wood elements, warm color palettes, and bohemian decor.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen integrated into the open living space featuring energy-efficient appliances, marble countertops, and ample storage.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated fitness area with high ceilings, mirrored walls, and modern equipment. Positioned for privacy while ensuring natural light from strategically placed windows.

openings.description: Main entrance with a robust wooden door complementing the bohemian aesthetic.
Large, decorative windows in living and gym areas for natural light.
